text: Ne olwabafwa omwoyo ninaye basita ebuleka okhutsia okhusanjilana. Omukali wabu naboola mbu: “Enywe shimwitsulila mbu papa wenyu abukule indakano ninanyu khulira lia Nyasaye? Ne khale awo mwakhola obwononi khu Yusuf? Kho esie shindalarula mushialo muno tawe , okhula papa wanje yasubule, nohomba Nyasaye yambusilie, naye niye omulayi wokhubusia.”
